page.title: 16FARM LIFE
page.content: THE FARMER TODAY BEARS NO RESEMBLANCE TO HIS COUNTERPART OF FIFTY YEARS AGO.NOT ONLY DOES HE NEED TO KNOW ALL ABOUT THE CARE OF HIS ANIMALS,THE BREEDING AND REARING OF THE YOUNG,THE MILKING,SILAGE MAKING AND THE HAY MAKING.HE ALSO NEEDS TO BE A MECHANIC,A HEALTH AND SAFTY EXPERT,A CHEMIST,AN ACOUNTANT AND A PERSON WHO CAN DEAL WITH THE VARIOUS INSPECTORS WHO MIGHT CALL. THE SMALL FARMER,WITH MAYBE FIFTY ACRES OF LAND IS RAPIDLY DISAPPEARING TO BE REPLACED BY THE BIG FARMER. THE FARMERS WIFE MAY OCCASIONALLY HAVE TIME TO TURN THE SULPHUS MILK INTO CREAM OR INTO CHEESE BUT THIS IS FOR HOME USE AND NOT FOR SALE.SHE NEEDS TO LOOK AFTER THE HOME AND FAMILY AS EVER BUT ALSO SHE HAS TO DRIVE THE CHILDREN TO SCHOOL,DRIVE TO TOWN AND SHOP AND ASSIST WITH THE MANY OFFICIAL FORMS.
